oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various WACO broadcasts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various WACO broadcasts including Santa Claus sketches; an interview with Henrietta Miller and Arthur James Miller regarding Doris Miller, conducted by M. P. Harvey; and 'Jinx Hot Shots' sports news read by Henry Harrison 'Jinx' Tucker.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Santa Claus sketches -- Bob Walker introduces M. P. Harvey -- M. P. Harvey introduces interview, Henrietta Miller and Arthur James Miller -- Henrietta Miller and James Miller talk about Doris Miller -- M. P. Harvey concludes the interview -- Closing statement from Bob Walker -- Jinx Tucker reads the Waco sports news
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WACO (Radio station : Waco, Tex.); Walker, Bob, 1917-2007; Tucker, Jinx, 1894-1953; Miller, Doris, 1919-1944
